LanguageData.BondedWithAnimal.label: Création d'un lien
LanguageData.BondedWithAnimal.rulePack.rulesStrings.2: image->[human_nameFull] formant un profond lien avec [animal_nameFull] [circumstance_group]
LanguageData.BondedWithAnimal.rulePack.rulesStrings.3: image->[human_nameFull] réalisant [human_possessive] son amour sincère pour [animal_nameFull] [circumstance_group]
LanguageData.BondedWithAnimal.rulePack.rulesStrings.5: circumstance_phrase->pendant qu'il(elle) regarde [animal_nameShortDef] dans les yeux
LanguageData.BondedWithAnimal.rulePack.rulesStrings.8: desc_sentence->[animal_nameShortDef] semble endormi(e) et ivre d'amour.
LanguageData.BondedWithAnimal.rulePack.rulesStrings.9: desc_sentence->[animal_nameShortDef] se tient majestueusement et a l'air noble.
LanguageData.BecameLover.label: Tombé amoureux
LanguageData.BecameLover.rulePack.rulesStrings.1: image->[firstPawn_nameFull] chuchotant de douces paroles à l'oreille de [secondPawn_nameFull] [circumstance_group]
LanguageData.BecameLover.rulePack.rulesStrings.2: image->[firstPawn_nameFull] conduisant [secondPawn_nameFull] par la main jusqu'au lit [circumstance_group]
LanguageData.BecameLover.rulePack.rulesStrings.3: image->[firstPawn_nameFull] batifolant dans le lit avec [secondPawn_nameFull] [circumstance_group]
LanguageData.BecameLover.rulePack.rulesStrings.8: circumstance_phrase->pendant qu'ils sont trempés de sueur
LanguageData.BecameLover.rulePack.rulesStrings.10: desc_sentence->[firstPawn_nameShortDef] ne quitte pas [secondPawn_nameShortDef] des yeux.
LanguageData.BecameLover.rulePack.rulesStrings.13: desc_sentence->[firstPawn_nameShortDef] est une image miroir de [secondPawn_nameShortDef].
LanguageData.Breakup.label: Rupture
LanguageData.Breakup.rulePack.rulesStrings.1: image->[firstPawn_nameFull] faisant s'asseoir [secondPawn_nameFull] pour tenir une discussion déplaisante [circumstance_group]
LanguageData.Breakup.rulePack.rulesStrings.2: image->[firstPawn_nameFull] se tenant à distance de [secondPawn_nameFull] [circumstance_group]
LanguageData.Breakup.rulePack.rulesStrings.3: image->[firstPawn_nameFull] poussant [secondPawn_nameFull] en dehors du lit [circumstance_group]
LanguageData.Breakup.rulePack.rulesStrings.5: circumstance_phrase->dans un moment de grande tristesse
LanguageData.Breakup.rulePack.rulesStrings.6: circumstance_phrase->tandis que d'autres regardent ailleurs, embarrassés
LanguageData.Breakup.rulePack.rulesStrings.9: desc_sentence->[secondPawn_nameShortDef] ricane, et pleure en même temps.
LanguageData.Breakup.rulePack.rulesStrings.10: desc_sentence->[secondPawn_nameShortDef] n'a plus aucune expression, à cause du choc.
LanguageData.Breakup.rulePack.rulesStrings.12: desc_sentence->[secondPawn_nameShortDef] s'est effondré(e) sur le sol en se recroquevillant et en frissonnant.
LanguageData.Marriage.label: Mariage
LanguageData.Marriage.rulePack.rulesStrings.2: image->[firstPawn_nameFull] disant [firstPawn_possessive] vœux de mariage à [secondPawn_nameFull] [circumstance_group]
LanguageData.Marriage.rulePack.rulesStrings.4: image->[firstPawn_nameFull] tenant les mains de [secondPawn_nameFull] durant leur cérémonie de mariage [circumstance_group]
LanguageData.Marriage.rulePack.rulesStrings.9: desc_sentence->[firstPawn_nameShortDef] ne quitte pas [secondPawn_nameShortDef] des yeux.
LanguageData.Marriage.rulePack.rulesStrings.12: desc_sentence->[firstPawn_nameShortDef] est une image miroir de [secondPawn_nameShortDef].
